sourcesContent: /* Reset Styles */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: "Outfit", sans-serif; overflow-x: hidden; /* Prevent horizontal scrolling */ } .navbar { background-color: #17003C; padding: 1rem 2rem; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; z-index: 100; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; border-bottom-left-radius: 100px; border-bottom-right-radius: 100px; } .navbar-logo { width: 50px; height: 50px; } .hamburger { display: none; flex-direction: column; justify-content: space-around; width: 25px; height: 25px; background: transparent; border: none; cursor: pointer; } .hamburger span { width: 100%; height: 3px; background-color: white; border-radius: 2px; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .nav-links { list-style: none; display: flex; gap: 1rem; } .nav-links li a { color: white; text-decoration: none; font-size: 18px; transition: color 0.3s ease; } .nav-links li a:hover { color: #FF9900; } /* Responsive Design */ @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .hamburger { display: flex; } .nav-links { display: none; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; position: absolute; top: 100%; left: 0; width: 100%; background-color: #17003C; padding: 1rem 0; gap: 1rem; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .nav-links.active { display: flex; } .navbar-logo { width: 40px; height: 40px; } } @media screen and (max-width: 480px) { .nav-links li a { font-size: 16px; } .navbar { padding: 0.5rem 1rem; } .navbar-logo { width: 30px; height: 30px; } }
